Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIa bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Inhibits the growth of several Gram-positive bacteria, especially the food-borne pathogen Listeria monocytogenes, but has no effect on the growth of a number of yeasts and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Characterization of the chemical and antimicrobial properties of piscicolin 126, a bacteriocin produced by Carnobacterium piscicola JG126.
Literature.Author: Jack RW, Wan J, Gordon J, Harmark K, Davidson BE, Hillier AJ, Wettenhall RE, Hickey MW, Coventry MJ.
